Posts.Content: loulou1lump wrote: Hi and thank you for letting me join our group. I have been told I have a 19mm spiculated mass at 2oclock in left breast. Having fine needle biopsy on 13 th Dec. Trying to be positive as I know nothing will change the results of the biopsy but I feel like I am looking at someone else going through this, very surreal. I guess these feeling are quite normal. I worry for my husband who hasn't left my side and is crying at the drop of a hat. I am sorry to seem like I am waffling on but this is all so new Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting biopsy loulou1lump Moderators
